Subscription.Description: Application crashes, hangs and error reporting logs.
Subscription.Query: <QueryList><Query Id="0" Path="Application"><Select Path="Application">*[System[Provider[@Name='Application Error' or @Name='Application Hang'] and (Level=2) and (EventID=1000 or EventID=1002)]]</Select><Select Path="Application">*[System[Provider[@Name='Windows Error Reporting'] and Level=4 and EventID=1001]]</Select></Query><Query Id="1" Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/EXE and DLL"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/EXE and DLL">*[UserData[RuleAndFileData[PolicyName="EXE"]]]</Select><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/MSI and Script">*</Select><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/Packaged app-Execution">*</Select><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/Packaged app-Deployment">*</Select></Query><Query Id="2" Path="Autoruns"><Select Path="Autoruns">*</Select></Query><Query Id="3" Path="Microsoft-Windows-Bits-Client/Operational"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Bits-Client/Operational">*</Select></Query><Query Id="4" Path="Microsoft-Windows-CodeIntegrity/Operational"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-CodeIntegrity/Operational">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-CodeIntegrity'] and (Level=2 or Level=3) and (EventID=3001 or EventID=3003 or EventID=3023)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="5" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Security-Auditing'] and (Level=0 or Level=4) and (EventID=5038 or EventID=6281 or EventID=6410)]]</Select></Query><Query Id="6" Path="Microsoft-Windows-DeviceGuard/Operational"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-DeviceGuard/Operational">*</Select></Query><Query Id="7" Path="System"><Select Path="System">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Kernel-PnP'] and Level=3 and EventID=219]]</Select></Query><Query Id="8" Path="System"><Select Path="System">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Eventlog']]]</Select></Query><Query Id="9" Path="Security"><Select Path="Security">*[System[(EventID=1100 or EventID=1104 OR EventID=1105 OR EventID=1108)]]</Select></Query></QueryList>
